title: Book 4 - Intermediate Level

words.meaning: to make someone interested in something
words.example: The bright colors attract customers to the store.

words.meaning: to stay away from something
words.example: I try to avoid eating too much sugar.

words.meaning: knowing about something
words.example: Are you aware of the new policy?

words.meaning: to keep something steady
words.example: It's important to balance work and family life.

words.meaning: to think something is true
words.example: I believe in working hard to achieve goals.

words.meaning: to be a member of a group
words.example: This book belongs to the library.

words.meaning: an advantage or positive result
words.example: Exercise has many health benefits.

words.meaning: to say someone is responsible for something bad
words.example: Don't blame yourself for the accident.

words.meaning: to annoy or trouble someone
words.example: I don't want to bother you with my problems.

words.meaning: to take air into and out of your lungs
words.example: Take deep breaths to relax.

words.meaning: short in time or length
words.example: I'll give you a brief summary of the meeting.

words.meaning: giving out a lot of light
words.example: The sun is bright today.

words.meaning: to make something by putting parts together
words.example: They're building a new school in our neighborhood.

words.meaning: to be on fire
words.example: The candle burns slowly.

words.meaning: to break open suddenly
words.example: The balloon burst when it touched the sharp object.

words.meaning: to put something in the ground
words.example: They buried the treasure in the backyard.

words.meaning: to work out a number or amount
words.example: I need to calculate the total cost.

words.meaning: to stop something from happening
words.example: I had to cancel my appointment due to illness.

words.meaning: to look after someone or something
words.example: Parents care for their children.

words.meaning: to hold and take something somewhere
words.example: Can you help me carry these bags?

description: Intermediate level English vocabulary with academic and professional words.
